list.name: Changes
list.comment: Added scon cache folders to gitignore. Updated workspace xml file.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Custom Build Application.Editor Debug Tracy.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Editor Debug.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Editor Release Tracy.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Editor Release.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Game Debug Tracy.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Game Debug.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Game Release PRODUCTION.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Game Release Tracy.executor": "Profiler", "Custom Build Application.Game Release).executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.Run Tests Tracy.executor": "Debug", "Custom Build Application.Run Tests.executor": "Run", "Custom Build Application.TESTS - Game.executor": "Debug", "Custom Build Application.Test Direct Load.executor": "Debug", "Custom Build Application.Test Headless.executor": "Run", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.RadMigrateCodeStyle": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "RunOnceActivity.readMode.enableVisualFormatting": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "cf.advertisement.text.has.clang-format": "true", "cf.advertisement.text.overridden": "true", "cf.first.check.clang-format": "false", "cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "com.jetbrains.cidr.cpp.cmake.workspace.CMakeCacheInvalidator.marker": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "directional__sprite__rendering", "last_opened_file_path": "/home/main/godot/dungeon_arpg/godot/tests", "run.code.analysis.last.selected.profile": "pProject Default", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "reference.settings.ide.settings.web.browsers" } }

task.summary: Default task

Added a 'Description' player ability type which is more self contained.
This is an incomplete implementation. Currently able to trigger just like before.

Added a 'Description' player ability type which is more self contained.
This is an incomplete implementation. Currently able to trigger just like before.
Simplified how items are connected and what they do. Abilities are now connected to Description and plays animations which can perform the emitting.
Simplified how items are connected and what they do. Abilities are now connected to Description and plays animations which can perform the emitting.

Large refactor on items and abilities. - UI now controls cooldown. - World now is told when it activates. - Base stat like defines are gone and instead will rely on flecs default values which are then modified.
This is incomplete. Next step will be to connect modifiers into flec components so modifiers actually impact them.
Godot tracy commit.
Added GETSET for all the getter setter pairs that are needed for gdscript.
Fixed an unintended not-printed debug message.
Fixed an unintended not-printed debug message.
Added ability for flec components to modify entities as they are spawned. This is used for player projectile spawning.

Big content update where modifiers have been simplified with enums. Trying new things with enums for printing and lists.
Also some cleanup using new macro GETSET. This occasionally renames internal variables.
Excluding dynamic linking due to extra warning, honestly didn't save much time.
Projectiles now pass through enemies without reducing damage.
Added additional spawn options for the ability emitter parent, position, and angle. Fixed a bug where using the basis for a flecs element copied the scale in.
Added additional spawn options for the ability emitter parent, position, and angle. Fixed a bug where using the basis for a flecs element copied the scale in.
Disable texture warning.
Mild game changes to make fireball activate less.

In progress moving away from update singleton. Original UpdateServer pattern completely removed. UpdateLoopServer is now a hook in for Main's update script and sends out signals. Simplifying GameMainServer to have less init dependencies.
Updated update loop server by completely removing the individual loop object. Removed Physics loop. Added pre/post events for each major stage.
Updated update loop server by completely removing the individual loop object. Removed Physics loop. Added pre/post events for each major stage.

Continued cleanup. GameMainNode is now mostly settable in editor.
Game and editor continues to run.
Added additional editor flag check.

Continued effort in decoupling singletons everywhere to a single singleton with normal nodes.
Game is back to a runnable state. May have fixed crashing bug due to TextInstance3D overloading mesh properties and causing havoc.
Split parts from main game node into separate nodes.

Flecs systems are no longer a singleton node but are now a static class and normal node. Moved several functions from FlecsDataKeeperServer to FlecsAccessor.
No major function changes.
Renamed FlecsDataKeeperServer to FlecsSystemSubscriber. No functional changes.
Added new flecs subscription system. Systems are added to a static list using REGISTER_FLEC_SYSTEM and are sorted.
Refactor continues. Moved all flec systems into macro. Cleaned up some headers to reduce rework being done.
Continued cleanup with removing some common flecs.h usage. Not a big impact to build time as flecs.h is mostly imported elsewhere.
Updated flecs pipelines to be significantly simpler due to priority system.
Removed unused file which caused leak warnings (world_environment.tscn) Downsized 2k image which had a long loading time on startup.
Added verbose printout for resource loading with warnings on longer load times. Pushed up where updateLoopServer is removed on shutdown but had no impact. 1x leftover string 'Node'.
Moved GameMainNode to a new folder 'game_core_setup'.
Added build mode to generated files.

Added --game_tests to the engine. This allows test cases to run in game engine and render to the screen with access to project files.
THis was very painful and annoying to get to :(
Added workspaces to project.
Added game test sample. Player can move around the scene.

Exposed GameMain item management node.
Fixed bug where item cards would stay up. This was caused by the item slot moving its item to stash and not updating the card with that info.
File movement change. No functional changes.
Added hack to allow hovered equipment items properly update when they are updated. Previously they would be stuck and not update, or would pull the card when we add an item to a slot.
Moved some flec components and renamed some to have more consistent F and FDC prefixes. Added death_after_time. Fixed bug where spawning attacks directly on top of the entity would be directionless.
Added basic unit test for AOE damage. Fixed major mistake with resources for setting up player. Added ability to load a flec godot dummy.
Items now print debug information.
Small cleanup with no major changes.
Small cleanup with no major changes.

Large content push.
Prototype directional sprites with pipeline for rendering models as spritesheets. Currently the snail model is used with actual depth and normal maps.
Updated the name of some flec components to become more standardized.
Project cleanup. Removed old testing files and moved many folders around.
More verbose building. Block build extra if already running. Added faster building and cache but on empty builds did not help in a meaningful way.
Continued project cleanup. Added stone textures.
Added scon cache folders to gitignore. Updated workspace xml file.

MESSAGE.value:
Flecs systems are no longer a singleton node but are now a static class and normal node. Moved several functions from FlecsDataKeeperServer to FlecsAccessor.
No major function changes.
Renamed FlecsDataKeeperServer to FlecsSystemSubscriber. No functional changes.
Added new flecs subscription system. Systems are added to a static list using REGISTER_FLEC_SYSTEM and are sorted.
Refactor continues. Moved all flec systems into macro. Cleaned up some headers to reduce rework being done.
Continued cleanup with removing some common flecs.h usage. Not a big impact to build time as flecs.h is mostly imported elsewhere.
Updated flecs pipelines to be significantly simpler due to priority system.
Removed unused file which caused leak warnings (world_environment.tscn) Downsized 2k image which had a long loading time on startup.
Added verbose printout for resource loading with warnings on longer load times. Pushed up where updateLoopServer is removed on shutdown but had no impact. 1x leftover string 'Node'.
Moved GameMainNode to a new folder 'game_core_setup'.
Added build mode to generated files.

Added --game_tests to the engine. This allows test cases to run in game engine and render to the screen with access to project files.
THis was very painful and annoying to get to :(
Added workspaces to project.
Added game test sample. Player can move around the scene.

Exposed GameMain item management node.
Fixed bug where item cards would stay up. This was caused by the item slot moving its item to stash and not updating the card with that info.
File movement change. No functional changes.
Added hack to allow hovered equipment items properly update when they are updated. Previously they would be stuck and not update, or would pull the card when we add an item to a slot.
Moved some flec components and renamed some to have more consistent F and FDC prefixes. Added death_after_time. Fixed bug where spawning attacks directly on top of the entity would be directionless.
Added basic unit test for AOE damage. Fixed major mistake with resources for setting up player. Added ability to load a flec godot dummy.
Items now print debug information.
Small cleanup with no major changes.

Large content push.
Prototype directional sprites with pipeline for rendering models as spritesheets. Currently the snail model is used with actual depth and normal maps.
Updated the name of some flec components to become more standardized.
Project cleanup. Removed old testing files and moved many folders around.
More verbose building. Block build extra if already running. Added faster building and cache but on empty builds did not help in a meaningful way.
Continued project cleanup. Added stone textures.
Added scon cache folders to gitignore. Updated workspace xml file.
